name: Here goes Your Name
description: Hello! My name is Asraful Islam Taj, and I'm a passionate Embedded System Engineer With Expertise of Firmware Devlopment in ARM cortex MCU, particularly in STM32. Over the years, I have honed my skills by Developing Driver code for various peripherals like GPIO, UART, I2C, SPI, CAN. I am constantly learning and adapting to new technologies to stay ahead in this ever-evolving field. When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new tech trends, reading books, or enjoying a good hike. Welcome to my portfolio, where you can learn more about my skills, projects, and experiences. Let's connect and build something amazing together!
